title: [Dynamic Regions] multiple rocksdb tikv panic for called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

[2023/03/11 15:42:43.170 +00:00] [INFO] [[lib.rs:91](http://lib.rs:91/)] ["Enable Features:   pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine cloud-aws cloud-gcp cloud-azure"]
[2023/03/11 15:42:43.170 +00:00] [INFO] [[lib.rs:91](http://lib.rs:91/)] ["Profile:           dist_release"]
### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

